story.subtitle: The Artist
story.title: Alma: From Patagonia to the World
paragraphs: Born amidst the rugged winds and vast landscapes of Argentine Patagonia, my journey began with a deep appreciation for nature's raw beauty. I graduated in Visual Arts from the Universidad Nacional de CÃ³rdoba (UNC), a foundation that has traveled with me across oceans and cultures.

My path led me to Ireland's green hills, Amsterdam's artistic canals, and finally to Italy's culinary heart. Each place added a layer to my identity as a visual artist and chef, complemented by my certification in Art Therapy and rigorous HACCP food safety standards.

With years of experience in gastronomy, photography, and illustration, I weave these disciplines together. My food is not just eaten; it is experienced visually and emotionally, creating a bridge between the plate and the soul.

mainContent.heading: The Synergy of Art & Goodness
paragraphs: I believe that true well-being comes from a holistic balance. There is a profound connection between what we see, what we eat, and how we feel.
Art stimulates the mind, nutrition fuels the body, and connection nourishes the spirit.

By integrating visual arts with conscious gastronomy, we create a sanctuary for the senses. This synergy forms the foundation for balanced well-being, inviting you to slow down, appreciate beauty in the details, and reconnect with yourself and others in a meaningful way.

sustainability.heading: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Every choice we make in the kitchen is an opportunity to care for the planet. From sourcing to serving, sustainability guides our practice.

items.heading: Local & Seasonal
items.description: Sourcing ingredients from local farmers and producers, respecting the natural rhythm of the seasons.

items.heading: Zero Waste
items.description: Minimizing waste through thoughtful planning, composting, and creative use of every ingredient.

items.heading: Conscious Choices
items.description: Prioritizing organic, ethically-sourced products that honor both the earth and the people who cultivate it.

workshops.subtitle: Experiences
workshops.title: Creative Workshops
workshops.description: Immerse yourself in a hands-on exploration of creativity. Our workshops blend visual arts techniques with culinary skills, teaching you to see ingredients as a palette and the plate as a canvas.

types.heading: Visual Arts
types.description: Explore illustration, photography, and composition. Learn to capture the essence of nature and translate it into visual storytelling.

types.heading: Conscious Cooking
types.description: Master techniques that honor ingredients. Focus on flavors, textures, and the healing properties of food.
